data.name: TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children - White Lion and Black Witch - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack of TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children - White Lion and Black Witch.

- Featuring 27 songs from the PC version of the game.
- Ethan Jeffrey and several other composers contribute to this soundtrack.
- Files are available in 320kbps MP3 format, as well as FLAC format. (4 files are available in 320kbps MP3 format only.)

All the profit from this product will be used to enrich TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children. We'll do our best to give more pleasure.
